headline: Global Payments Releases 2025 Global Responsibility Report
summary: ATLANTA, September 08, 2025--Global Payments Inc. (NYSE: GPN), a leading worldwide provider of payment technology and software solutions, today announced the release of its 2025 Global Responsibility Report. The report highlights the company’s initiatives and accomplishments across its sustainability focus areas for the full year 2024.
